trans-unit.source: Provides a type-safe collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce una raccolta indipendente dai tipi di <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroupCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroupCollection"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup"></xref> to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup"> </xref> alla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup"></xref> to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup"> </xref> da aggiungere alla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup"></xref> that was added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: L'indice del <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup"> </xref> che è stato aggiunto alla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroupCollection"></xref> contains the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroupCollection"> </xref> contiene l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup"></xref> to locate.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup"> </xref> da individuare.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup"></xref> is contained in the collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup"> </xref> è contenuto nella raccolta; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroupCollection"></xref> values to a one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Copie di <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroupCollection"> </xref> valori in un oggetto unidimensionale <xref:System.Array>in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the values copied from the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroupCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto unidimensionale <xref:System.Array>che rappresenta la destinazione dei valori di stato copiato il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroupCollection"> </xref>.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The index in the `array` where copying begins.
trans-unit.target: L'indice di `array` in cui ha inizio la copia.

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup"></xref> in the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroupCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'indice di un <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup"> </xref> nel <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroupCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup"></xref> to locate.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup"> </xref> da individuare.

trans-unit.source: The index of the of value in the , if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: L'indice del di value nel , se presente; in caso contrario, -1.

trans-unit.source: Inserts a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup"></xref> into the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroupCollection"></xref> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Inserisce un <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup"> </xref> nel <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroupCollection"> </xref> in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index where `value` should be inserted.
trans-unit.target: L'indice in base zero in cui `value` deve essere inserito.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup"></xref> to insert.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup"> </xref> da inserire.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup"></xref> specified.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup"> </xref> specificato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup"></xref> specified.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup"> </xref> specificato.

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Specificato <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes a specific <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup"></xref> from the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroupCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove un oggetto specifico <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup"> </xref> dal <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroupCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup"></xref> to remove from the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroupCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup"> </xref> per rimuovere il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroupCollection"> </xref>.
